name: Blizzard Strayer

in_play_description:
When the character uses a Skill or equips a Talent Card: Spend 1 less Cryo Die. (Once per Round)
Roll Phase: 2 of the starting Elemental Dice you roll are always guaranteed to be Cryo Dice.

skills.desc:
